mapper.select: select ci.product_id, p.product_name, ci.qty, p.price_excl, ci.unit_price_excl as unit_price_at_cart_addition, p.stock, p.status from cart_item ci join product p on p.product_id = ci.product_id where ci.cart_id = #{cartId} order by ci.created_at desc, ci.product_id desc for update
mapper.insert:
insert into order_item ( order_id, product_id, product_name, qty, unit_price_incl, subtotal_incl ) values
(#{it.orderId}, #{it.productId}, #{it.productName}, #{it.qty}, #{it.unitPriceIncl}, #{it.subtotalIncl})
